attributes.title: Copywriter
attributes.subTitle: We need an expert to work remotely
attributes.cardDescription: Do you know English at level B1 or above? Are you good at writing texts? Then we will be happy to invite you to our team! We need a copywriter to work remotely for an IT company.

attributes.title: Team Lead SEO
attributes.subTitle: Requires an employee to work remotely
attributes.cardDescription: The IT company RemotEmployees is looking for a team leader in the SEO department. Knowledge of English (at least B2 level) is required.

attributes.title: Targetologist
attributes.description:
## Who is a Targetologist?
A targetologist is a person engaged in setting up targeted advertising in search engines, social networks, and advertising systems. 
**The targetologist’s task –** is to customize advertising in a way that attracts the right audience.
Our company is interested in talented people who want to gain new skills and improve them in practice.## Responsibilities of the Targetologist include:
The main responsibility of the targeting specialist is the high-quality customization of advertising for a specific target audience to attract customers.
You will also need to develop strategies, create and control advertising campaigns.
If you are just a beginner, we will help you with training.
Don’t hesitate to apply for this position. Just record a [videointerview](/videointerview) in English. We will consider your candidacy!
## Basic requirements for the Targetologist
* Be proficient in spoken and written English. It is necessary for working with clients
* Do a high-quality analysis of the information and target audience
* Learn quickly and be ready to change. Be aware of new developments in the field
* Be an advanced user of a PC (MS Office). (Optional skill)
attributes.subTitle: There is a vacancy for working remotely
attributes.cardDescription: The Targetologist vacancy is already waiting for you at RemotEmployees! If you are fluent in English (B1+) and ready to work from home, this job is for you!

attributes.title: Email Marketer
attributes.subTitle: Requires a specialist to manage mailing lists
attributes.cardDescription: IT company Remote Employees is looking for an Email Marketer Specialist with fluent English (B1+) for working on foreign projects.

attributes.title: Traffic manager
attributes.subTitle: Remote specialist for Foreign Projects
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees company is looking for a traffic management specialist with fluent English (B1+ level and above). No experience is needed.

attributes.title: Media Buyer
attributes.description:
## Who is a Media buyer?
**Media buyer is** an expert at purchasing and advertising media space. He is responsible for promoting and posting advertising products on informational platforms, the Internet, and social networks. Media buyer jobs are associated with reaching out to mass media, purchasing advertising space in newspapers, various public pages, Google and Facebook advertising companies, Youtube, Telegram channels, and news and specialized resources.## Media Buyer Responsibilities
Media Buyer activity is involved in advertising, entrepreneurship, the cost of advertising in mass media, and negotiation skills.
Nowadays, the profession of digital Media Buyer is sought-after. The main advantage of online advertising is the possibility of prompt reporting about the product or service to the target customers without geographical borders. Besides, the possibility of clear targeting in advertising and measuring results helps optimize marketing budgets and establish optimal sales processes.
You do not need special training or a degree to become a digital Media Buyer.
We offer you to try yourself as a **digital media buyer** even if you are inexperienced, but you can:
Furthermore, a media buyer job requires interpersonal communication and negotiation skills, the ability to present a product in a way that promotes distribution success and awareness, and an understanding of the fundamentals of marketing, economics, and general psychology.
If you are sociable and fluent in English, understand the basics of marketing, but have a lack of experience, we are ready to consider your candidacy for a remote media buyer position. Just record a [videoresume](/videointerview/) about yourself and your skills and send it to us. Do not miss your chance to start your career in IT.
## We offer you to try yourself as a digital media buyer even if you are inexperienced, but you can:
* Analyze information
* Know principles of Facebook Ads and Google Ads campaigns
* Understand the basics of SEO and SEM
* Fluency in English ( B1-C1)
attributes.subTitle: We need a specialist to work remotely
attributes.cardDescription: Remote Employees company is looking for remote media buyers with a high proficiency in English (В1+) to work on international projects.

attributes.title: Team Lead SMM
attributes.description:
## What are the responsibilities of an SMM specialist?
You will be responsible for establishing the company’s brand and maintaining an image on social networks. SMM team lead position is a great opportunity to improve your skills in promotion and marketing!/span>
## Why SMM?
Companies of different profiles and sizes are looking for SMM specialists. The main thing that unites them is intensive development. RemotEmployees is focused on providing workplaces for Ukrainian employees. It gives you the opportunity to expand your experience by cooperating with foreign customers. This is the most effective way to develop key SMM skills.
## Required skills for candidates for the position of head of Social Media Marketing
Desire, interest, and commitment are the three main qualities we look for in each employee. The RemotEmployees company needs an experienced SMM specialist with the knowledge, skills, and ability to lead SMM managers.

## Apply for the vacancy
Fill out the form, and we will contact you!
## Присоединяйтесь
## The responsibilities of the Team Lead SMM:
* Defining and segmenting the target audience.
* Setting the SMM goal, writing content and media plans.
* Setting up targeted advertising in social networks
* Event creation and promotion
* Promotion in social networks
attributes.subTitle: Looking for a responsible employee
attributes.cardDescription: RemoteEmployees company has opened a vacancy for the head of the marketing department on social networks for online projects. Knowledge of English (B2+) is required. In connection with the expansion of the IT company, there is the possibility of getting an SMM manager job.

attributes.title: Influencer Manager
attributes.description:
## Additional Information: 
* English level B1+ is essential.

## What You’ll Work On:
* Communications, Posts, Stories, Strategy, Partnerships

## Key Responsibilities:

* **Manage Communications:** Facilitate ongoing dialogue to ensure alignment and effective collaborations.
* **Boost Posts:** Increase reach by promoting content that resonates with target audiences.
* **Establish Partnerships:** Build relationships with key figures to expand brand awareness and engagement.
* **Share Stories:** Develop and share authentic content that aligns with the brand’s message.
* **Prepare Strategy:** Design effective social media plans that drive engagement and growth.

## Toolset You’ll Use:
ChatGPT, Notion, Google Sheets, CapCut, Instagram

## Why You’ll Love to Work with Us:

* **Remote Job:** Enjoy the flexibility of working from anywhere.
* **Full-Time:** Hours from 9:00 to 18:00 with a one-hour lunch break.
* **Salary:** Paid twice a month with bonus opportunities.
* **Experience:** Work on international projects, gaining valuable global exposure.
* **Collaborative Team:** Join a supportive team that encourages creativity and growth.
attributes.subTitle: There is a vacancy on a remote basis
attributes.cardDescription: Seeking an Influencer Manager to develop partnerships, create impactful strategies, and enhance social media presence. Ideal candidates are skilled in communication, content creation, and relationship building.

attributes.title: SMM manager
attributes.description:
## Additional Information:

* English (B1+) is essential.

## What You're Going to Work With:
Communications, Social Media Profiles, Ads, Metrics, Posts, Visuals

## Key Responsibilities:

* **Track Metrics:** Monitor and analyze performance data to optimize campaigns and content strategy.
* **Manage Communications:** Engage with audiences and handle social media interactions across various channels.
* **Create Posts:** Develop appealing content tailored to platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube.
* **Launch Ads:** Implement paid advertising campaigns on Facebook Ads and Instagram Ads.
* **Manage Profiles:** Oversee and update profiles to maintain brand consistency and appeal.
* **Edit Visuals:** Adjust images and videos by refining colors, cropping, and adding text overlay.

## Tool Set You’re Expected to Work With:
ChatGPT, CapCut, InShot, Canva, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Facebook Ads, Instagram, Instagram Ads, Adobe Photoshop.

## Why You'll Love Working with Us:

* **Remote Job:** Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.
* **Full-time Schedule:** 9:00 to 18:00 with a 1-hour lunch break.
* **Competitive Salary:** Receive bi-monthly payments with opportunities for bonuses.
* **Global Exposure:** Contribute to international projects and broaden your social media expertise.
* **Collaborative Team:** Join a supportive, creative team that encourages growth and innovation.
attributes.subTitle: We are looking for a specialist for remote work
attributes.cardDescription: We’re seeking a SMM Manager to drive a social media presence and engage audiences across multiple platforms. If you’re data-driven and idea-rich, this remote position could be a great fit for you!

attributes.title: Content strategist
attributes.description:
## Additional Information:
* English (B1+) is essential.

## What You’ll Work On:
Ads, Creatives, Posts, Content plan, Texts

## Key Responsibilities:

* **Develop Content Plan:** Organize media strategy that align with brand goals and engage our audience effectively.
* **Publish Posts:** Schedule publications to maintain a consistent and appealing online presence.
* **Generate Texts:** Craft engaging and relevant content to accompany social media posts and ads.
* **Create Ads:** Design and launch effective advertising campaign across Facebook and Instagram to boost brand visibility.
* **Make Creatives:** Produce high-quality visuals using tools like Canva and CapCut to enhance brand storytelling.

## Toolset You’ll Use:
Instagram, Ads manager, Canva, CapCut, Chat GPT, Notion, Google Sheets

## Why You'll Love Working with Us:

* **Remote Job:** Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.
* **Full-time Schedule:** 9:00 to 18:00 with a 1-hour lunch break.
* **Competitive Salary:** Receive bi-monthly payments with opportunities for bonuses.
* **Global Exposure:** Contribute to international projects and broaden your social media expertise.
* **Collaborative Team:** Join a supportive, creative team that encourages growth and innovation.
attributes.subTitle: There is a vacancy for remote work
attributes.cardDescription: We are seeking a creative and strategic Content Strategist to lead the development of our content initiatives across social media platforms. If you excel at crafting content plans, generating impactful text, and creating ads and visuals, this role is perfect for you.

attributes.title: Affiliate Manager
attributes.description:
## Who is an Affiliate Manager?
**An affiliate manager is a**  person who is not engaged in sales but Affiliate marketing and searches for various platforms (websites, social networks) to post links to a product that people may take an interest in.
## Affiliate manager responsibilities:
* ### **Affiliate Marketing**
* ### **Partner searching**
* ### **Partners support**
* ### **Strategy development**
* ### «Product-Partner-Traffic»
* ### Knowledge of the following terms: CPC, CPM, CTR, CPA
* ### **Analysis of advertising campaigns**
* ### Proficiency in English
* ### Ability to work with Excel
* ### Ability to interact with people
Remote work in the European and American markets is waiting for you. If the Affiliate Manager position sounds like a great fit for you, then don’t hesitate to write to us at once. Apply for the Affiliate Manager vacancy and become a part of our progressive company, RemotEmployees.
## Affiliate manager responsibilities:
* Affiliate Marketing
* Partner searching
* Partners support
* Strategy development
* «Product-Partner-Traffic»
attributes.subTitle: Urgently need a specialist to work remotely
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees company needs an Affiliate manager with good English knowledge (B1 +). No experience is needed!

attributes.title: PR Manager
attributes.subTitle: A specialist is required to work remotely with knowledge of English level B1 or higher
attributes.cardDescription: We require remote PR Managers with work experience or willing to try themselves in this sphere. Good command of English (B1+) is required.
